languages.text: "Пускай {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} и был остановлен..." {n}Хейнрикс прикрывает глаза, а в его голосе появляются горькие ноты.{/n} "Я прикасался к чудовищной машине, сотворенной ради служения Хаосу. Использовал ее. Вникал в принцип ее работы... этого достаточно. Скверне достаточно самого малого касания".

traits.locale_text: "Пускай {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} и был остановлен..." {n}Хейнрикс прикрывает глаза, а в его голосе появляются горькие ноты.{/n} "Я прикасался к машине, сотворенной злом ради зла. Использовал ее. Вникал в принцип ее работы... этого достаточно. Скверне достаточно самого малого касания".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."
languages.original_text: "Пускай {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} и был остановлен..." {n}Хейнрикс прикрывает глаза, а в его голосе появляются горькие ноты.{/n} "Я прикасался к чудовищной машине, сотворенной ради служения Хаосу. Использовал ее. Вникал в принцип ее работы... этого достаточно. Скверне достаточно самого малого касания".

traits.locale_text: "The cogitator was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched a machine that was created by evil for the sake of evil. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The cogitator was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched a machine that was created by evil for the sake of evil. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched a machine that was created by evil for the sake of evil. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “那台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}确实停下来了，没错……”{n}海因里希闭上了眼睛，声音中带上了一丝苦涩的味道。{/n}“我触碰了那台为侍奉混沌的邪恶机器。我使用了它，研究了它的运作原理……这足以让我受到腐化的侵蚀。哪怕是最短暂的接触，也足以让腐化钻入灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: “那台{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}确实停下来了，没错……”{n}海因里希闭上了眼睛，声音中带上了一丝苦涩的味道。{/n}“我触碰了那台为侍奉混沌的邪恶机器。我使用了它，研究了它的运作原理……这足以让我受到腐化的侵蚀。哪怕是最短暂的接触，也足以让腐化钻入灵魂。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The cogitator was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

languages.text: «Detuvimos el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, sí...». {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos por un instante, y un deje de amargura surge en su voz.{/n} «Toqué una máquina infernal creada como instrumento del Caos. Me sumergí en los principios de su operación... y eso fue suficiente. La corrupción solo necesita el más mínimo contacto».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: «Detuvimos el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, sí...». {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos por un instante, y un deje de amargura surge en su voz.{/n} «Toqué una máquina infernal creada como instrumento del Caos. Me sumergí en los principios de su operación... y eso fue suficiente. La corrupción solo necesita el más mínimo contacto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}は止められた。そうだ…」{n}ハインリックスはしばし目を閉じ、苦みが混じった声を出した。{/n}「私は渾沌に仕えるために作られた地獄の機械に触れた。私はそれを使った。その動作原理を詳らかにした…。それで十分だった。腐敗に必要なのは、ほんの短い接触だけなのだ」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}は止められた。そうだ…」{n}ハインリックスはしばし目を閉じ、苦みが混じった声を出した。{/n}「私は渾沌に仕えるために作られた地獄の機械に触れた。私はそれを使った。その動作原理を詳らかにした…。それで十分だった。腐敗に必要なのは、ほんの短い接触だけなのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} wurde aufgehalten, ja ..." {n}Heinrix schließt kurz die Augen. Ein Anflug von Verbitterung schleicht sich in seine Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe eine infernalische Maschine berührt, die erschaffen wurde, um dem Chaos zu dienen. Ich habe sie genutzt. Ich bin in die Grundsätze ihrer Funktionsweise eingetaucht ... Das war genug. Die Verderbnis benötigt nur eine flüchtige Berührung."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} wurde aufgehalten, ja ..." {n}Heinrix schließt kurz die Augen. Ein Anflug von Verbitterung schleicht sich in seine Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe eine infernalische Maschine berührt, die erschaffen wurde, um dem Chaos zu dienen. Ich habe sie genutzt. Ich bin in die Grundsätze ihrer Funktionsweise eingetaucht ... Das war genug. Die Verderbnis benötigt nur eine flüchtige Berührung."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} a été mis hors d'état de nuire, oui... » {n}Heinrix ferme brièvement les yeux et poursuit sur un ton plus amer :{/n} « Mais ce faisant, j'ai touché une machine infernale créée pour servir le Chaos. Je l'ai utilisée. J'ai frôlé du doigt les principes qui la muaient... et ça a suffi pour que la corruption établisse le contact. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: « Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} a été mis hors d'état de nuire, oui... » {n}Heinrix ferme brièvement les yeux et poursuit sur un ton plus amer :{/n} « Mais ce faisant, j'ai touché une machine infernale créée pour servir le Chaos. Je l'ai utilisée. J'ai frôlé du doigt les principes qui la muaient... et ça a suffi pour que la corruption établisse le contact. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g} durdu, evet..." {n}Heinrix, kısa bir süreliğine gözlerini kapatıyor. Sesinde bir karamsarlık duyuluyor.{/n} "Kaos'a hizmet etsin diye yapılmış, lanetli bir makineye dokundum. Kullandım. Çalışma prensiplerini anladım... O kadarı da yetti. Parmağının ucuyla dokunmak, yozlaşmaya yeter."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was stopped, yes..." {n}Heinrix closes his eyes briefly, and a note of bitterness enters his voice.{/n} "I touched an infernal machine that was created to serve Chaos. I used it. I delved into the principles of its operation... That was enough. Corruption needs only the briefest brush of contact."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Kavramsayar{/g} durdu, evet..." {n}Heinrix, kısa bir süreliğine gözlerini kapatıyor. Sesinde bir karamsarlık duyuluyor.{/n} "Kaos'a hizmet etsin diye yapılmış, lanetli bir makineye dokundum. Kullandım. Çalışma prensiplerini anladım... O kadarı da yetti. Yozlaşmak için parmağının ucuyla dokunsan yeterli."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
